examples.example: 我家可爱的小金鱼在鱼缸里欢快地游来游去。

translate.english: My lovely little goldfish is swimming happily back and forth in the fish tank.

examples.example: 我在水族馆里看到了各种各样美丽的金鱼，它们真是太迷人了。

translate.english: I saw all kinds of beautiful goldfish in the aquarium, and they are really so charming.

examples.example: 我买了几条漂亮的金鱼放在客厅的鱼缸里，它们为家里增添了许多生气。

translate.english: I bought several beautiful goldfish and put them in the fish tank in the living room, and they have added a lot of vitality to the home.
